mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_UNIT_INFO set t.UNIT_ID=#{unit_id}, t.UNIT_NAME=#{unit_name}, t.FUNCTION_SEQUE=#{function_seque}, t.STATUS=#{status}, t.REMARK=#{remark}, t.CREATE_TIME=#{create_time}, t.CREATE_USER_ID=#{create_user_id}, t.CREATE_USER_NAME=#{create_user_name}, t.UPDATE_TIME=#{update_time}, t.UPDATE_USER_ID=#{update_user_id}, t.UPDATE_USER_NAME=#{update_user_name} where 1=1
mapper.select: SELECT t.UNIT_ID, t.UNIT_NAME, t.FUNCTION_SEQUE, t.STATUS, t.REMARK, t.CREATE_TIME, t.CREATE_USER_ID, t.CREATE_USER_NAME, t.UPDATE_TIME, t.UPDATE_USER_ID, t.UPDATE_USER_NAME FROM SYS_UNIT_INFO t where 1 =1

SELECT t.UNIT_ID, t.UNIT_NAME, t.FUNCTION_SEQUE, t.STATUS, t.REMARK, t.CREATE_TIME, t.CREATE_USER_ID, t.CREATE_USER_NAME, t.UPDATE_TIME, t.UPDATE_USER_ID, t.UPDATE_USER_NAME FROM SYS_UNIT_INFO t where 1 =1

SELECT RW,a.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RW, t.UNIT_ID, t.UNIT_NAME, t.FUNCTION_SEQUE, t.STATUS, t.REMARK, t.CREATE_TIME, t.CREATE_USER_ID, t.CREATE_USER_NAME, t.UPDATE_TIME, t.UPDATE_USER_ID, t.UPDATE_USER_NAME FROM SYS_UNIT_INFO t ) a WHERE RW between #{pageSize} * (#{currPage} - 1) + 1 AND (#{pageSize} * (#{currPage} - 1)) + #{pageSize}
SELECT t.UNIT_ID, t.UNIT_NAME, t.FUNCTION_SEQUE, t.STATUS, t.REMARK, t.CREATE_TIME, t.CREATE_USER_ID, t.CREATE_USER_NAME, t.UPDATE_TIME, t.UPDATE_USER_ID, t.UPDATE_USER_NAME FROM SYS_UNIT_INFO t
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_UNIT_INFO ( UNIT_ID, UNIT_NAME, FUNCTION_SEQUE, STATUS, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_USER_NAME ) values ( #{unitId}, #{unitName}, #{functionSeque}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{createTime}, #{createUserId}, #{createUserName}, #{updateTime}, #{updateUserId}, #{updateUserName} )
